airfield.bdy:
Wipim Airport is an airport in Wipim,
Papua New Guinea ( IATA: WPM). It is located in Wipim, Papua New Guinea at 142.85 longitude by -8.75 latitude. The airport has 2 flights per week flying on small aircraft from Wipim Airport, 1 airline operating out of Wipim Airport, 2 domestic flights per week from Wipim Airport, and can have 36 passengers travel out of Wipim Airport every week 1 The runway is 1640 ft. long and elevated 100 ft. It's world area code is 804.2.
